content.description: Gordon notices that his bathroom faucet leaks. He has no experience with plumbing repairs, but he has watched videos online. Therefore, Gordon thinks he can fix the faucet himself.
content.question: Which of the following concepts is most likely to explain Gordonâ€™s thinking?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
